column2: "I have put you through much trouble. We're going to have to designate you as one of the top-class wired lance users."

"I have nothing more to teach you, but your
battles have just begun."

"I know you don't need to be told to keep
applying yourself, so let me just say this:
good luck and work hard."

"ご苦労だった。今後は君を
一流のワイヤードランス使いと
呼ばせてもらおうじゃないか。"

"私から教えられることはもうないが
今後は自分との戦いが続く。"

"君なら言われなくても精進を重ねる
ことと思うが、頑張ってほしい。"
